description.para: See the TermStructure documentation for issues regarding constructors.

simplesect.para: term structures initialized by means of this constructor must manage their own reference date by overriding the referenceDate() method.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Date &referenceDate, const Calendar &cal, BusinessDayConvention bdc, const DayCounter &dc=DayCounter())
memberdef.name: VolatilityTermStructure

briefdescription.para: initialize with a fixed reference date

memberdef.argsstring: (Natural settlementDays, const Calendar &cal, BusinessDayConvention bdc, const DayCounter &dc=DayCounter())
memberdef.name: VolatilityTermStructure

briefdescription.para: calculate the reference date based on the global evaluation date
the business day convention used in tenor to date conversion
the minimum strike for which the term structure can return vols
the maximum strike for which the term structure can return vols

detaileddescription.para: This abstract class defines the interface of concrete volatility structures which will be derived from this one.
